bibl.title: New Texts from the Berlin Cartonnages.
bibl.note: Preliminary presentation of texts deriving from a cartonnage found by Otto RUBENSOHN during excavations near the modern village of Abusir el-Meleq (to be published in a forthcoming dissertation).

bibl.title: Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II

bibl.seg: SALMENKIVI Erja, New Texts from the Berlin Cartonnages.

Isabella ANDORLINI, Guido BASTIANINI, Manfredo MANFREDI e Giovanna MENCI (a cura di), Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II (Firenze, 2001) pp. 1155-1159.
Preliminary presentation of texts deriving from a cartonnage found by Otto RUBENSOHN during excavations near the modern village of Abusir el-Meleq (to be published in a forthcoming dissertation).
